page.title: 14Industries of Frome
page.content: There are many industries in Frome. One of the biggest is book printing with one large and two smaller factories. Another is a hot brass stamping foundry. The largest manufacturer of electrical fuses is also in Frome. Cuprinal Ltd. are producers of wood treatment chemicals. A former cloth mill is now used to make tufted carpets. A branch of the Marley Group make P.V.C. sheeting. The quarry industry, which is a very large employer in this area, is represented by A.R.C., whose regional H.Q. is in Frome. There are also many small light engineering firms here. The County Council is trying to attract more industries to Frome. By Tricia Denning (10)
